item.title: Chinese fantasy action RPG Redemption of Liuyin announced for PS5, Xbox Series, and PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/chinese-fantasy-action-rpg-redemption-of-liuyin-announced-for-ps5-xbox-series-and-pc

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out in 2025.

KingnaGame, the Chinese developer behind Nine Treasures of Liuyin, has announced Redemption of Liuyin, an ancient-style fantasy action RPG with multiple endings. It will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store in 2025 with English, Japanese, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, and Korean language support.

Here is an overview of the game, via it Steam page:

About

This is a 3D ancient style fantasy, multi-ending action role-playing game. As the third installment of the Ryukyu Hidden series and the Ryukyu Hidden Nine Absolute Reincarnation Chapter, the game is designed with the principle of promoting offense and hesitation to defeat in its combat system.

Preface Guidance

As the third installment of the Ryukyu Hidden series and the Ryukyu Hidden Nine Ultimate Reincarnation Chapter, the game is designed with a combat system that advocates for attack and the belief that hesitation will lead to defeat. The goal is to create a sweat drenched combat experience for players in every game.

Story Outline

The story begins many years ago when a crystalline fragment of spirit stone suddenly appeared on the earth. It is rumored that this thing can cure a hundred diseases and regenerate nature. The rulers slaughtered extensively in order to collect more fragments, leading to separatist disputes and rampant monsters. This world seems to have become another hell. The protagonist is a member of a mysterious organization who sets foot on an ancient fortress in search of a divine artifact. They meet a group of cunning enemies and fight against the powerful enemies within the fortress, uncovering the truth behind the worldâ€™s curse of decay.

Game Features, Integrated Themes, Fast-Paced Defense, and Counterattack Battles

The ancient style is mystical and fantastical, with strange thoughts and deeds. The battles progress layer by layer, and the plot twists and turns.

Collect Various Martial Arts Skills and Freely Match Your Own System

In addition to honing their combat skills, players also need to analyze the characteristics and strategic strategies of their skill combinations. The game is designed with three sets of active and passive systems, allowing players to quickly familiarize themselves with and combine these skills to quickly defeat and suppress enemies.

Multi-Branch Plot and Ending

The game adopts a multi-branch plot mode, where the order of defeating each branch will affect the original boss or plot structure, resulting in slightly different changes in the plot and drops. Increasing efforts to explore treasures and adventures can greatly reduce the difficulty of facing enemies.

The game has a rich combination of skill strategies, a thrilling storyline, and dozens of different mechanisms of enemies.

item.title: Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster demo now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/dead-rising-deluxe-remaster-demo-now-available

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Play from the start of the game.

A demo for Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is now available for PlayStation 5 via PlayStation Store, Xbox Series via Microsoft Store, and PC via Steam, Capcom announced.

This demo lets you play from the start of Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster, however some aspects may differ from the full version. Save data from the demo cannot be transferred to the full game.

Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam. A physical edition launched today.
